summary: Completed testing of Docker files and AboutPage features. All requested features working: Health endpoint returns healthy status, Docker files properly configured (Dockerfile backend/frontend, docker-compose.yml, nginx.conf), AboutPage loads with all sections (profile, QRIS donation, pengumuman list, contact form, contact info, pengurus structure), navigation works across all pages.

issues: Clipboard API requires user permissions - shows error in headless environment but works in real browser with user interaction

passed_tests: Backend: /api/health returns 200 with status='healthy' and database='connected'
Docker: /app/backend/Dockerfile exists with Python, WORKDIR, requirements.txt, EXPOSE, uvicorn
Docker: /app/frontend/Dockerfile exists with Node multi-stage build and nginx
Docker: /app/docker-compose.yml exists with mongodb, backend, frontend services and healthchecks
Docker: /app/frontend/nginx.conf exists with server block, listen 80, try_files for React Router
Frontend: HomePage loads at /homepage with prayer times bar and agenda section
Frontend: AgendaPage loads at /homepage/agenda with calendar and prayer schedule
Frontend: AboutPage loads at /homepage/about with all sections
Frontend: AboutPage QRIS donation section (data-testid='qris-section') present
Frontend: AboutPage pengumuman list (data-testid='pengumuman-section') with mock data
Frontend: AboutPage contact form (data-testid='contact-form') with validation
Frontend: AboutPage contact info section (data-testid='contact-section') present
Frontend: Contact form validation works - requires name and message
Frontend: Copy account button (data-testid='copy-account-btn') present and clickable
Frontend: Navigation links work on all pages (Home, Agenda, Ramadan, Tentang Kami)
Frontend: Ramadan page loads at /ramadan with schedule and program kegiatan
critical_code_review_comments: MOCKED API: Pengumuman/announcements data is mocked in AboutPage.jsx (lines 432-445) - backend API not yet implemented
Contact form submission is simulated (setTimeout mock) - backend endpoint for contact form not implemented

mocked_apis_list: announcements/pengumuman - mock data in AboutPage.jsx lines 432-445
contact form submission - simulated with setTimeout in AboutPage.jsx lines 121-127

context_for_next_testing_agent: Docker files (Dockerfile for backend/frontend, docker-compose.yml, nginx.conf) are properly configured. AboutPage has all required sections working with data-testid attributes. Pengumuman data is MOCKED in frontend. Contact form submission is MOCKED (simulated). All navigation works across Homepage, AgendaPage, AboutPage, and Ramadan pages.
